kpi.name: M1002C95

kpi_info.title: NRT DCH REQ FOR PS CALL BACKG CLASS REJECT IN DL IN SRNC
kpi_info.use: A total number of rejected NRT DCH requests for a PS Call with background class in the SRNC for reasons caused by DL radio resources.
